CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing SkyFlow Water Index relative to TerraFuel Exchange?
SRP.A: SkyFlow Water Index is {below} TerraFuel Exchange in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Lumina Energy Market relative to GeoHeat Commodity?
SRP.A: Lumina Energy Market is {below} GeoHeat Commodity in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing GeoHeat Commodity relative to Lumina Energy Market?
SRP.A: GeoHeat Commodity is {above} Lumina Energy Market in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total natural gas prices?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {TerraFuel Exchange}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total natural gas prices?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {GeoHeat Commodity}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is SkyFlow Water Index's maximum Natural Gas Prices in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: SkyFlow Water Index's maximum Natural Gas Prices is in {2016}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is GeoHeat Commodity's maximum Natural Gas Prices in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: GeoHeat Commodity's maximum Natural Gas Prices is in {2008}.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2008, was the average total Natural Gas Prices higher or lower than between 2015 and 2016?
NC.A: The average total natural gas prices between 1998 and 2008 was {lower} than between 2015 and 2016.

NC.Q: Between 1996 and 2016, did the total Natural Gas Prices experience a larger or smaller change than between 1996 and 2000?
NC.A: The change in total natural gas prices between 1996 and 2016 was {larger} than between 1996 and 2000.

NC.Q: Was the total Natural Gas Prices in 1998 higher or lower than in 2000?
NC.A: The total natural gas prices in 1998 was {higher} than in 2000.

NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2005, was the average total Natural Gas Prices higher or lower than between 2009 and 2011?
NC.A: The average total natural gas prices between 2002 and 2005 was {lower} than between 2009 and 2011.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {TerraFuel Exchange} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did GeoHeat Commodity and Lumina Energy Market first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: GeoHeat Commodity and Lumina Energy Market first exchanged leading positions in {2000}.
